query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Quando ambedue li figli di Latona, 2 coperti del Montone e de la Libra, 3 fanno de l’orizzonte insieme zona,
4 quant’ è dal punto che ’l cenìt inlibra 5 infin che l’uno e l’altro da quel cinto, 6 cambiando l’emisperio, si dilibra,
7 tanto, col volto di riso dipinto, 8 si tacque Bëatrice, riguardando 9 fiso nel punto che m’avëa vinto.
query.result:
**English:**
1 When both the children of Latona, 2 covered by the Ram and the Scales, 3 make of the horizon a single zone,
4 as far as from the point where the zenith balances 5 until both of them, from that belt, 6 changing hemisphere, balance themselves,
7 so, with her face painted with laughter, 8 Beatrice was silent, gazing fixedly 9 at the point that had conquered me.
**Malay:**
1 Ketika kedua anak Latona, 2 ditutupi oleh Aries dan Libra, 3 menjadikan ufuk sebagai satu zona,
4 sejauh dari titik di mana puncak langit berada 5 hingga keduanya, dari sabuk itu, 6 mengubah belahan bumi, menyeimbangkan diri,
7 begitu, dengan wajah yang dilukis dengan tawa, 8 Beatrice terdiam, menatap tajam 9 pada titik yang telah menaklukanku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Poi cominciò: «Io dico, e non dimando, 11 quel che tu vuoli udir, perch’ io l’ho visto 12 là ’ve s’appunta ogne ubi e ogne quando.
query.result:
**English:**
10 Then he began: "I say, and do not ask, 11 what you want to hear, because I saw it 12 there where every where and every when is focused.
**Malay:**
10 Kemudian dia mulai: "Aku berkata, dan tidak bertanya, 11 apa yang ingin kamu dengar, karena aku telah melihatnya 12 di sana di mana setiap tempat dan setiap waktu difokuskan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Non per aver a sé di bene acquisto, 14 ch’esser non può, ma perché suo splendore 15 potesse, risplendendo, dir “Subsisto”,
16 in sua etternità di tempo fore, 17 fuor d’ogne altro comprender, come i piacque, 18 s’aperse in nuovi amor l’etterno amore.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Not to have for itself a good acquisition, 14 which cannot be, but so that its splendor 15 might, by shining, say “I exist”,
16 in its eternity of time before, 17 outside of all other understanding, as it pleased it, 18 the eternal love opened itself in new love.
**Malay:**
13 Bukan untuk memiliki perolehan kebaikan untuk dirinya sendiri, 14 yang tidak mungkin, tetapi agar kemegahannya 15 dapat, dengan bersinar, berkata “Aku ada”,
16 dalam keabadian waktunya sebelumnya, 17 di luar semua pemahaman lainnya, sebagaimana yang disukainya, 18 cinta abadi itu membukakan dirinya dalam cinta yang baru.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Né prima quasi torpente si giacque; 20 ché né prima né poscia procedette 21 lo discorrer di Dio sovra quest’ acque.
query.result:
**English:**
19 Nor did it lie dormant for long beforehand; 20 for neither before nor afterwards 21 did the word of God proceed over these waters.
**Malay:**
19 Tidak juga berbaring tidak bergerak sebelumnya; 20 karena baik sebelum mahupun sesudahnya 21 firman Tuhan tidak mengalir di atas air ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Forma e materia, congiunte e purette, 23 usciro ad esser che non avia fallo, 24 come d’arco tricordo tre saette.
query.result:
**English:**
22 Form and matter, joined yet pure, 23 came forth to be that which had no fault, 24 like three arrows from a three-stringed bow.
**Malay:**
22 Bentuk dan materi, bergabung namun murni, 23 keluar untuk menjadi sesuatu yang tidak memiliki cacat, 24 seperti tiga anak panah dari busur tiga tali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 E come in vetro, in ambra o in cristallo 26 raggio resplende sì, che dal venire 27 a l’esser tutto non è intervallo,
28 così ’l triforme effetto del suo sire 29 ne l’esser suo raggiò insieme tutto 30 sanza distinzïone in essordire.
query.result:
**English:**
25 And as in glass, in amber, or in crystal 26 a ray gleams so that between its coming 27 and its being there is no interval,
28 so the threefold effect of its Maker 29 in its being shone forth all at once 30 without distinction in its beginning.
**Malay:**
25 Dan seperti dalam kaca, dalam damar, atau dalam kristal 26 sinar bersinar terang, sehingga dari datangnya 27 hingga menjadi tidak ada jeda,
28 demikianlah efek rangkap tiga dari Penciptanya 29 dalam keberadaannya bersinar sekaligus 30 tanpa perbedaan pada awalnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Or sai tu dove e quando questi amori 47 furon creati e come: sì che spenti 48 nel tuo disïo già son tre ardori.
query.result:
**English:**
46 Now you know where and when these loves 47 were created and how: so that quenched 48 in your desire are already three ardors.
**Malay:**
46 Sekarang kamu tahu di mana dan kapan cinta-cinta ini 47 diciptakan dan bagaimana: sehingga padam 48 dalam keinginanmu sudah tiga bara api.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Né giugneriesi, numerando, al venti 50 sì tosto, come de li angeli parte 51 turbò il suggetto d’i vostri alimenti.
query.result:
**English:**
49 Nor did the giants, counting, arrive at twenty 50 as quickly as the angelic party 51 disturbed the subject of your nourishment.
**Malay:**
49 Raksasa-raksasa itu pun, menghitung, tidak sampai dua puluh 50 secepat pasukan malaikat 51 mengganggu sumber makanan kalian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 L’altra rimase, e cominciò quest’ arte 53 che tu discerni, con tanto diletto, 54 che mai da circüir non si diparte.
query.result:
**English:**
52 The other remained, and began this art 53 that you perceive, with so much delight, 54 that it never departs from its circuit.
**Malay:**
52 Yang lainnya tetap tinggal, dan memulai seni ini 53 yang kamu pahami, dengan begitu banyak kesenangan, 54 yang tidak pernah menyimpang dari peredarannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Principio del cader fu il maladetto 56 superbir di colui che tu vedesti 57 da tutti i pesi del mondo costretto.
query.result:
**English:**
55 The beginning of his fall was the accursed 56 pride of him whom you saw 57 weighed down by all the burdens of the world.
**Malay:**
55 Permulaan kejatuhannya adalah terkutuknya 56 kesombongan dari dia yang kamu lihat 57 terbebani oleh semua beban dunia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Quelli che vedi qui furon modesti 59 a riconoscer sé da la bontate 60 che li avea fatti a tanto intender presti:
61 per che le viste lor furo essaltate 62 con grazia illuminante e con lor merto, 63 si c’hanno ferma e piena volontate;
64 e non voglio che dubbi, ma sia certo, 65 che ricever la grazia è meritorio 66 secondo che l’affetto l’è aperto.
query.result:
**English:**
58 Those whom you see here were modest 59 in recognizing themselves from the goodness 60 that had made them so quick to understand:
61 for which their sight was exalted 62 with illuminating grace and with their merit, 63 so that they have firm and full will;
64 and I do not want you to doubt, but be certain, 65 that receiving grace is meritorious 66 according to how open the affection is to it.
**Malay:**
58 Mereka yang kamu lihat di sini adalah orang-orang yang sederhana 59 dalam mengakui diri mereka sendiri dari kebaikan 60 yang telah membuat mereka begitu cepat untuk memahami:
61 oleh karena itu penglihatan mereka ditinggikan 62 dengan rahmat yang menerangi dan dengan jasa mereka, 63 sehingga mereka memiliki keinginan yang kuat dan penuh;
64 dan aku tidak ingin kamu ragu, tetapi yakinlah, 65 bahwa menerima rahmat adalah berjasa 66 sesuai dengan seberapa terbuka kasih sayang itu kepadanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Omai dintorno a questo consistorio 68 puoi contemplare assai, se le parole 69 mie son ricolte, sanz’ altro aiutorio.
query.result:
**English:**
67 O you who are gathered around this assembly, 68 you can contemplate much, if my words 69 are understood, without any other help.
**Malay:**
67 Wahai kamu yang berkumpul di sekitar majelis ini, 68 kamu dapat merenungkan banyak hal, jika kata-kataku 69 dipahami, tanpa bantuan lainnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Ma perché ’n terra per le vostre scole 71 si legge che l’angelica natura 72 è tal, che ’ntende e si ricorda e vole,
73 ancor dirò, perché tu veggi pura 74 la verità che là giù si confonde, 75 equivocando in sì fatta lettura.
query.result:
**English:**
70 But why on earth do your schools teach 71 that angelic nature 72 is such that it understands, remembers, and wills,
73 I will say more, so that you may see purely 74 the truth that is confused down there, 75 equivocating in such a reading.
**Malay:**
70 Tetapi mengapa di bumi untuk sekolah-sekolah kalian 71 diajarkan bahwa sifat malaikat 72 adalah sedemikian rupa, sehingga ia mengerti, mengingat, dan berkehendak,
73 aku akan mengatakan lebih banyak, supaya kamu melihat dengan jelas 74 kebenaran yang di sana di bawah kacau balau, 75 salah paham dalam bacaan seperti itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Queste sustanze, poi che fur gioconde 77 de la faccia di Dio, non volser viso 78 da essa, da cui nulla si nasconde:
79 però non hanno vedere interciso 80 da novo obietto, e però non bisogna 81 rememorar per concetto diviso;
82 sì che là giù, non dormendo, si sogna, 83 credendo e non credendo dicer vero; 84 ma ne l’uno è più colpa e più vergogna.
query.result:
**English:**
76 These substances, after they were joyful 77 in the sight of God, did not turn their face 78 from it, from which nothing is hidden:
79 therefore they have not lost their sight 80 from a new object, and therefore it is not necessary 81 to remember through a divided concept;
82 so that down there, without sleeping, one dreams, 83 believing and not believing what is said to be true; 84 but in one there is more fault and more shame.
**Malay:**
76 Zat-zat ini, setelah mereka gembira 77 di hadapan Tuhan, tidak memalingkan wajah 78 dari-Nya, yang darinya tidak ada yang tersembunyi:
79 oleh karena itu mereka tidak kehilangan penglihatan mereka 80 dari objek baru, dan oleh karena itu tidak perlu 81 untuk mengingat melalui konsep yang terbagi;
82 sehingga di sana, tanpa tidur, seseorang bermimpi, 83 percaya dan tidak percaya apa yang dikatakan benar; 84 tetapi di salah satunya ada lebih banyak kesalahan dan lebih banyak rasa malu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Voi non andate giù per un sentiero 86 filosofando: tanto vi trasporta 87 l’amor de l’apparenza e ’l suo pensiero!
88 E ancor questo qua sù si comporta 89 con men disdegno che quando è posposta 90 la divina Scrittura o quando è torta.
query.result:
**English:**
85 You do not go down a path 86 philosophizing: so much does 87 the love of appearance and the thought of it transport you!
88 And even this up here behaves 89 with less disdain than when 90 the divine Scripture is neglected or twisted.
**Malay:**
85 Kamu tidak pergi ke bawah melalui jalan setapak 86 berfilsafat: begitu banyak 87 cinta akan penampilan dan pemikirannya mengangkutmu!
88 Dan bahkan ini di atas sini berperilaku 89 dengan penghinaan yang lebih sedikit daripada ketika 90 Kitab Suci diabaikan atau diputarbalikkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Non vi si pensa quanto sangue costa 92 seminarla nel mondo e quanto piace 93 chi umilmente con essa s’accosta.
query.result:
**English:**
91 One does not think how much blood it costs 92 to sow it in the world, and how much it pleases 93 he who humbly approaches it.
**Malay:**
91 Orang tidak memikirkan berapa banyak darah yang dikeluarkan 92 untuk menaburnya di dunia, dan betapa menyenangkannya 93 bagi orang yang dengan rendah hati mendekatinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Per apparer ciascun s’ingegna e face 95 sue invenzioni; e quelle son trascorse 96 da’ predicanti e ’l Vangelio si tace.
query.result:
**English:**
94 To appear, each one exerts himself and makes 95 his own inventions; and these are spread abroad 96 by the preachers, and the Gospel is silent.
**Malay:**
94 Untuk tampil, masing-masing berusaha keras dan membuat 95 ciptaannya sendiri; dan ciptaan-ciptaan itu disebarkan 96 oleh para pengkhotbah, dan Injil dibungkam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Non ha Fiorenza tanti Lapi e Bindi 104 quante sì fatte favole per anno 105 in pergamo si gridan quinci e quindi:
106 sì che le pecorelle, che non sanno, 107 tornan del pasco pasciute di vento, 108 e non le scusa non veder lo danno.
query.result:
**English:**
103 Florence has not so many Lapi and Bindis 104 as there are fables of this kind each year 105 shouted from the pulpit here and there:
106 so that the little sheep, who do not know, 107 return from pasture fed on wind, 108 and their not seeing the harm does not excuse them.
**Malay:**
103 Florence tidak mempunyai begitu banyak Lapi dan Bindi 104 seperti dongeng-dongeng semacam ini setiap tahun 105 diteriakkan dari mimbar di sana-sini:
106 sehingga domba-domba kecil, yang tidak tahu, 107 kembali dari padang rumput yang diberi makan angin, 108 dan tidak melihat kerugian tidak memaafkan mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Ora si va con motti e con iscede 116 a predicare, e pur che ben si rida, 117 gonfia il cappuccio e più non si richiede.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Now one goes preaching with jests and gibes, 116 and provided that one makes people laugh, 117 one's hood swells up and nothing more is required.
**Malay:**
115 Sekarang orang pergi berkhotbah dengan lelucon dan ejekan, 116 dan asalkan orang tertawa, 117 tudungnya mengembang dan tidak ada lagi yang diminta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Ma tale uccel nel becchetto s’annida, 119 che se ’l vulgo il vedesse, vederebbe 120 la perdonanza di ch’el si confida:
121 per cui tanta stoltezza in terra crebbe, 122 che, sanza prova d’alcun testimonio, 123 ad ogne promession si correrebbe.
query.result:
**English:**
118 But such a bird nests in its little beak, 119 that if the common people saw it, they would see 120 the forgiveness in which it trusts:
121 because of which so much foolishness grew on earth, 122 that, without proof of any testimony, 123 people would rush to any promise.
**Malay:**
118 Tetapi burung seperti itu bersarang di paruhnya yang kecil, 119 sehingga jika orang awam melihatnya, mereka akan melihat 120 pengampunan yang diyakininya:
121 karena itu begitu banyak kebodohan tumbuh di bumi, 122 sehingga, tanpa bukti kesaksian apa pun, 123 orang akan terburu-buru memenuhi janji apa pun.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Di questo ingrassa il porco sant’ Antonio, 125 e altri assai che sono ancor più porci, 126 pagando di moneta sanza conio.
query.result:
**English:**
124 Saint Anthony fattens his pigs on this, 125 and many others who are even greater pigs, 126 paying with counterfeit money.
**Malay:**
124 Santo Antonius menggemukkan babinya dengan ini, 125 dan banyak lagi lainnya yang bahkan lebih babi, 126 membayar dengan uang palsu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Ma perché siam digressi assai, ritorci 128 li occhi oramai verso la dritta strada, 129 sì che la via col tempo si raccorci.
query.result:
**English:**
127 But since we have digressed too much, turn 128 your eyes now toward the straight road, 129 so that the way may be shortened with time.
**Malay:**
127 Tetapi karena kita telah menyimpang terlalu jauh, arahkanlah 128 matamu sekarang ke jalan yang lurus, 129 sehingga perjalanan dapat diperpendek dengan waktu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 La prima luce, che tutta la raia, 137 per tanti modi in essa si recepe, 138 quanti son li splendori a chi s’appaia.
query.result:
**English:**
136 The first light, which all the horizon encircles, 137 is received in it in so many ways, 138 as are the splendors to which it is united.
**Malay:**
136 Cahaya pertama, yang melingkari seluruh ufuk, 137 diterima di dalamnya dengan begitu banyak cara, 138 sebanyak cahaya yang bersatu dengannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Onde, però che a l’atto che concepe 140 segue l’affetto, d’amar la dolcezza 141 diversamente in essa ferve e tepe.
query.result:
**English:**
139 Where, however, at the act that conceives 140 the affection follows, the sweetness of love 141 boils and rages differently in it.
**Malay:**
139 Di mana, namun, pada tindakan yang mengandung 140 kasih sayang mengikuti, manisnya cinta 141 mendidih dan menggelegak secara berbeda di dalamnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 Vedi l’eccelso omai e la larghezza 143 de l’etterno valor, poscia che tanti 144 speculi fatti s’ha in che si spezza,
145 uno manendo in sé come davanti».
query.result:
**English:**
142 Now you see the height and the breadth 143 of the eternal value, since so many 144 mirrors have been made in which it is broken up,
145 one remaining in itself as before».
**Malay:**
142 Sekarang kamu melihat ketinggian dan keluasan 143 nilai yang kekal, karena begitu banyak 144 cermin telah dibuat di mana ia dipecah,
145 satu tetap dalam dirinya seperti sebelumnya».
